name: One Box One Button
description:
How To Play: Click and hold Left Mouse Button on the Plug to drag it to Power Sockets Press the ! Button to activate the machines and advance to the next level Press the R key to Reload the stage

This game was made part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019 in 48 hours.

  • 3d models and UI - David Wong
  • Programming - Sanjeev Prasad
  • Game design - Walter Pham
  • Music - Nando Nguyen
Thanks for playing!
